mapper.update: update t_sub_items_info set item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bar_code = #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=REAL}, wholesale_price = #{wholesalePrice,jdbcType=REAL}, retail_price = #{retailPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, spec_comb = #{specComb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where sub_item_id = #{subItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select sub_item_id, item_id, image, code, bar_code, purchase_price, wholesale_price, retail_price, spec_comb, company_id from t_sub_items_info where sub_item_id = #{subItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select sub_item_id, item_id, image, code, bar_code, purchase_price, wholesale_price, retail_price, spec_comb, company_id from t_sub_items_info
